named-query.name: Restaurant.searchByName
named-query.query: from Restaurant where name like concat('%', :name, '%') and kitchen.id = :id

named-query.name: Restaurant.existsResponsible
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Restaurant rest join rest.responsibleUsers resp where rest.id = :restaurantId and resp.id = :userId

named-query.name: RestaurantOrder.isOrderManagedBy
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Order o join o.restaurant rest join rest.responsibleUsers resp where o.uuid = :orderUuid and resp.id = :userId
